data.title: SoCal's Cinco De Miles 5K and 5 MILE
meta_keywords: SoCal's Cinco De Miles 5K and 5 MILE
data.meta_description: SoCal's Cinco De Miles 5K and 5 MILE is on Sunday May 4, 2025. It includes the following events: 5K Run/Walk, 5 Miles Run, and Cinco de Mile.
data.meta_site_name: SoCal's Cinco De Miles 5K and 5 MILE
data.text:
Sunday. May 5, 2024 So Cal's Cinco de Miles 5k & 5 Miles

This will be a FULL FIESTA party run!

Come race, run, walk, or jog and you can even pick up your BLING the day before to celebrate!

Huge, unique custom cast medals with moving parts and a baby soft tech shirt fully designed front and back.

Come celebrate Hispanic Culture with us. And be as victorious in your pursuit of health as those warriors were in their victory at the Battle of Puebla. 5K and 5 miles or run the 1-mile family fun run. Have fun meeting people while celebrating cultures. Running is universal.

We serve chips and salsa at the finish. Live music and folkloric dancers. Street tacos are served.

RFIP CHIP TIMING and age division awards by Itz About Time.

COOL custom cast medals and Cinco De MILES authentic event t-shirts.

EVERY PARTICIPANT RECEIVES:

Custom Cinco de Miles cast medals

Cinco de Miles-themed event race shirts

Age division awards

RFID Chip timing by Itz About Time (itzabouttime.com)

Enjoy the music, the refreshments, and each other!

Caren Ware Events are designed for Every BODY and EVERYBODY! And are MOST Festive!

RACE LOCATION: Huntington State Beach, CA. (lot 10. Corner of Beach Blv. and Pacific Coast Hwy)

21601 Pacific Coast Hwy, Huntington Beach, CA 92646 is the google address. But enter in the GATE on the corner of PCH and Beach Blvd. To the EAST. If you enter to the WEST you are heading into the City of Huntington Beach lot. The first lot on the left is the race! After the race, enjoy the fun amenities of Pacific City. Limited spaces for metered parking on the street. Parking in Pacific City. State Park charges $15 for parking. Carpool!

EARLY RACE PACKET PICK-UP (for your convenience) or you may pick up the bib and shirt on race day at the race site. You may pick up for others.

Saturday, May 3rd noon to 3 pm. Costa Mesa's Road Runner Sports 1835 Newport Blvd, Costa Mesa, CA 92627

RACE DAY SCHEDULES:

6:30 am Registration OPENS

Shirts are given with bibs at registration. Medals when you finish

7:45 am to 8:15 am FOLKORIC DANCERs, CABRILLOS, DANCING HORSE AND PERFORMANCES

8:15 am START of Kid's family fun run. (1 Mile)

8:30 am Mass START of 5K/5 Mile

9 : 15 am Start of 5k AWARDS CEREMONY

9:30 am Start of the 5-mile AWARD CEREMONY

bring EXTRA CASH FOR STREET TACOS, AGUA FRESCA, FRESH FRUIT, AND SPECIALTY COFFEES FROM THE COFFEE TRUCK

FINISHER MEDALS TO every Finisher

AGE DIVISION AWARDS:

5-year Age Spans: 3 deep with 5-year age spans: 5k and 5 Mile 1-10, 11-14, 15-19, 20-24, 25-29, 30-34, 35-39 40-44, 45-49, 50-54,55-59 60-64, 65-69, 70-74, 75-79, 80&over

Top 3 Overall Trophies to Males & Females Plus award to Oldest finisher. Youngest finisher.

Pets: Friendly Pets are allowed and must be leashed at all times and accompanied by a Run /Walk participant. Please use a leash of 5 ft or less, for the safety of all pets and runners. Line up towards the back of the pack at the start and keep to the side of the race field on the course.

Stroller: Families can bring strollers, but agree to use at their own risk. We do ask that you line up towards the back of the pack at the start and keep to the side of the race field on the course. Note, that only registered participants with a BIB will receive a finisher medal.

Please make sure your BIB is in the front and visible to our volunteers. And watch for cyclists enjoying the same beach bike path you are running on.

The race will take place rain or shine. RESTROOMS are in the public buildings at the end of each of the parking lots.
